messages.message: Yeah I don’t recall if there was a particularly strong reason for doing so. It was a pattern we started  with early on and we just kind of stuck with it.

I have no objections to consolidating here. I do completely agree with Xi though, with the introduction of the V2 namespace (finally after 6 years!) we shouldn’t squander this chance to organize our endpoints a bit better. Let’s not have every developer add routes without looking at the namespace holistically.
